summary: Comprehensive testing of HFashion e-commerce demo completed. Backend APIs fully functional (100% pass rate). Frontend core functionality working with minor UI display issues on homepage product sections.

ui_bugs.issue: Product cards not displaying in featured and trending sections despite API returning data
ui_bugs.workaround: Products can be accessed via direct navigation or category pages

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix homepage product display issue - featured and trending products are not rendering in their respective sections despite API returning correct data. Check React component state management and product loading logic in HomePage.jsx.
